author: Ivana Martini
title: Fashion Police: Insta-scram
text:
No matter how many throw pillows tastefully embroidered with “let it go” that I give her, my chum Mackerel-Faye DelaCroix insists on embracing trends long past their sell-by date.
What’s worse, she’s now combining them in an effort to create new fads.
“I expect to go viral any day,” said Mackie, as she scrolled through photos of her latest project.
Hint: What do you get when you combine boudoir photography and food Instagramming?
Answer: Some very disturbing images of roast chicken and black lace.
Speaking of things I’d like to unsee, get a load of the getups caught in this week’s red-­carpet stakeout.
